price: Деди: «Сизларга юборилган бу пайғамбарингиз аниқ телбадир».
arabic: قَالَ إِنَّ رَسُولَكُمُ ٱلَّذِيٓ أُرۡسِلَ إِلَيۡكُمۡ لَمَجۡنُونٞ

version.title: Uzbek Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Uzbek by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qāla inna rasūlakumu alladhī ur'sila ilaykum lamajnūnun
